deliveryAddress.addressLine1: St. Mary & St. Michael Rc Church, The Presbytery, 2 Lukin Street

query:
mutation AddToCart($input: AddToCartInput!) {
  addToCart(input: $input) {
    addedLineItemId
    consignmentLimitReached
    hasFinishingTouches
    cart {
      ...FragmentCart
      __typename
    }
    __typename
  }
}

fragment FragmentCart on Cart {
  id
  maxCheckoutStep
  worldpayRedirectUrl
  paymentMethod
  unavailableItems {
    lineItemId
    name
    checkoutError
    __typename
  }
  showMarketingPreferences
  cutOff {
    secondsRemaining
    day
    isInPast
    __typename
  }
  ...FragmentBaseOrder
  __typename
}

fragment FragmentBaseOrder on BaseOrder {
  marketing {
    online
    post
    email
    sms
    __typename
  }
  subtotal {
    centAmount
    fractionDigits
    currencyCode
    formatted
    __typename
  }
  deliveryPassType
  deliveryPassDiscount {
    centAmount
    fractionDigits
    currencyCode
    formatted
    __typename
  }
  totalDeliveryPassDiscount {
    centAmount
    fractionDigits
    currencyCode
    formatted
    __typename
  }
  deliveryCost {
    centAmount
    fractionDigits
    currencyCode
    formatted
    __typename
  }
  totalPrice {
    centAmount
    fractionDigits
    currencyCode
    formatted
    __typename
  }
  totalItems
  consignments {
    id
    isMaxQuantity
    isDigital
    isClickAndCollect
    cutOff {
      secondsRemaining
      day
      isInPast
      __typename
    }
    rotation
    delivery {
      date
      address {
        addressLine1
        addressLine2
        addressLine3
        postalCode
        city
        county
        country
        id
        __typename
      }
      serviceCode
      serviceDescription
      serviceType
      charge {
        formatted
        __typename
      }
      __typename
    }
    collection {
      date
      address {
        rotationWeight
        executingMemberNo
        latitude
        longitude
        distance
        openingTime
        closingTime
        countyName
        postCode
        countryType
        name
        addLine2
        town
        phoneNo
        custLatitude
        custLongitude
        __typename
      }
      __typename
    }
    items {
      lineItem {
        id
        sku
        productId
        product {
          key
          name
          countryCode
          isInternational
          isOverseas
          categoryNames
          isDropship
          __typename
        }
        name
        url
        price {
          centAmount
          fractionDigits
          currencyCode
          formatted
          __typename
        }
        quantity
        images {
          url
          __typename
        }
        occasion
        cardMessage
        deliveryDate
        deliveryInstructionOption
        deliveryInstructionNote
        specialInstructions
        deceasedName
        funeralServiceDate
        funeralServiceTime
        promotionalText
        attributes {
          name
          value
          __typename
        }
        category {
          name
          ancestors {
            name
            __typename
          }
          __typename
        }
        __typename
      }
      finishingTouchLineItems {
        id
        sku
        productId
        isGiftItem
        product {
          key
          name
          categoryNames
          __typename
        }
        name
        url
        price {
          centAmount
          fractionDigits
          currencyCode
          formatted
          __typename
        }
        quantity
        images {
          url
          __typename
        }
        category {
          name
          ancestors {
            name
            __typename
          }
          __typename
        }
        __typename
      }
      recipient {
        firstName
        lastName
        phone
        isFuneralDirector
        __typename
      }
      __typename
    }
    __typename
  }
  billingAddress {
    ...FragmentAddress
    __typename
  }
  couponCode
  couponDiscount {
    centAmount
    fractionDigits
    currencyCode
    formatted
    __typename
  }
  __typename
}

fragment FragmentAddress on Address {
  id
  firstName
  lastName
  addressLine1
  addressLine2
  addressLine3
  postalCode
  city
  county
  country
  phone
  mobile
  email
  isDefaultAddress
  deliveryInstructionNote
  deliveryInstructionOption
  __typename
}
